mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PAYMENT VALUES(#{pay_member_no}, PAYMENTSEQ.NEXTVAL, #{pay_name}, #{pay_email}, #{pay_phone}, #{pay_type}, #{pay_price}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT PAY_MEMBER_NO, PAY_NO, PAY_NAME, PAY_EMAIL, PAY_PHONE, PAY_TYPE, PAY_PRICE, PAY_DATE, ROWNUM FROM (SELECT PAY_MEMBER_NO, PAY_NO, PAY_NAME, PAY_EMAIL, PAY_PHONE, PAY_TYPE, PAY_PRICE, PAY_DATE, ROWNUM FROM PAYMENT WHERE PAY_MEMBER_NO = #{pay_member_no} ORDER BY PAY_DATE DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
